comment.body: 记得有人开发了一个闭源的ZeroNet库，可以用在iOS上
应该是unicode字符几乎都合法吧
@Realjohndoe: What if a user wrote messages in more than one languages?
safari supported `` long times ago. Unfortunately other browsers have not followed this yet.
Why egg yolk itself is harmful? Insecticide absorbed in fats is a common problem for all animal food.
@leftside: According to recent researches, cholesterol in food is not the main contributor of cholesterol in blood.

@leftside: I forgot them. A quick search on Google Scholar turns out that these researches are in fact not very recent. For example, a [meta-analysis in 1997](https://www.bmj.com/content/314/7074/112?) of 395 experiments concluded that the quantitative importance of diet to blood cholesterol remains uncertain, and [a paper published in 2011](https://www.cambridge.org/core/journals/british-journal-of-nutrition/article/dietary-cholesterol-from-physiology-to-cardiovascular-risk/2AD4493E735677B9298CCC17FA790539) stated that "Dietary cholesterol content does not significantly influence plasma cholesterol values". I heard about dietary cholesterol does not matter about three or four years ago. The spreading of information is slow.
I found out that trying brain hurting problems sometimes does help learning new skills. (figuratively hurting, not physically hurting, though)
No, they can argue with you without reading anything you have written. ;-)
Add an option to turn still gif avatar in ZeroMe, and send a pr on github.
@Tommykakashi: "Long time no see" is valid English. It may derive ultimately from an English pidgin such as that spoken by Native Americans or Chinese. Technically it is not Chinglish.
@Git Center: Terrible user experience. They should not allow you to set your display name to `****** support` instead of suddenly banning your account afterwards.

Sony still sells its [lipstick-style mp3](https://www.sony.com.hk/en/electronics/walkman/nwz-b180-series). Unfortunately it only supports mp3 and wma, no ogg or flac support. Also do not expect too much on its sound quality. BTW, why do you say making playlist is a pain for Sandisk Clip? AFAIK, Sandisk Clip supports standard m3u playlist file. You can just create one on the computer, then transfer it to the mp3 player.
That will involve much more merges, which has a expensive performance cost.

According to [Mozilla](https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/recommendations-firefox), this "entire process of identifying browsing patterns and matching appropriate features or extensions takes place locally".
